page.title: 10A DAY IN THE LIFE OF PAUL
page.content: The day begins with dad getting up at 6.15a.m. He wakes my brother Andrew who delivers the village newspapers. At 6.50a.m. dad takes mum a cup of tea and then she gets up. Mum does a few household chores, then wakes me up. I have breakfast and get ready for school. Dad goes to work at 7.30a.m., he works at Perkins a factory in Peterborough. Mum goes to work at 8.40a.m., she is a homehelp to senior citizens who are unable to help themselves in their homes. My brother and I return home at about 4.00p.m. and have a hot meal. We then go to our different places of sport. Andrew enjoys cricket and I enjoy athletics and music. Dad returns home at 6.30p.m. and at about 8.30p.m. we all meet for a short chat and hot drink before we go to bed. BY PAUL BAILEY AGED 11years.
